channel.title: [TUT] Chaning the max ammount of an item that you can have
channel.description:
Open up player.java
Search for [code]public int maxItemAmount[/code]
You should come up with something like this. [code]public int maxItemAmount = 2000000000;[/code]
You can change the number to anything upto 2147483647, this is the maximum integer value in java. You will get an error if you try to put it higher. Also, it cannot be a decimal number.

item.title: [TUT] Chaning the max ammount of an item that you can have
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Can you also do this for:
1.)

public int[] playerLevel = new int[25];
public int[] playerXP = new int[25];

2.)
public int[] playerItems = new int[28];
public int[] playerItemsN = new int[28];

3.)

public int playerBankSize = 350;
  1. is how much exp you get right?? the “public int[] playerLevel = new int[25];” i dont know

2.Dont know what that is

3.Bank Space

(could someone tell me what 1 and 2 are :-p)

Read full topic

The float maximum is 3.40282346638528860e+38. Anyone got a scietific calculator?

item.title: [TUT] Chaning the max ammount of an item that you can have
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:

If you wanted to mess up your server, you could try:

public float maxItemAmount = 2000000000;

That allows it. I doubt it’ll work, something I just made in a few seconds. Untested.

Read full topic
